subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Brandt Snedeker rallied to defeat Luke Donald in a playoff at the Heritage in Hilton Head Island, S.C., allowing Lee Westwood to move atop the World Golf Rankings.
snippet: Brandt Snedeker rallied to defeat Luke Donald in a playoff at the Heritage in Hilton Head Island, S.C., allowing Lee Westwood to move atop the World Golf Rankings.
